Articles.Content: Is there a mod out there that extends the randomly-generated asteroids into larger sizes? E class asteroids are big and unwieldy, sure, but I'd like to have F, G, H, etc sizes that follow the same size progression. If I've done the math right, a Z class 'roid might be about 2/3 the size of Gilly, meaning you have approximately ZERO chance of changing its orbit in any meaningful way. But still, it seems like these things would be out there, and would make for a worthwhile challenge. Is there such a mod? My Google-fu has not uncovered one.

Try looking into the cfg files and adjust the rarity.

If that is possible.

would be funny - but i think there might be Problems since the asteroids have no gravity-well yet.... and 2/3 size gilly should at least have a tiny bit of grav.

... BUT - IF it is doable - with gravity - it would be great! LKO-moon FTW
